Patient resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id

Contains .identifier with .system and .value

Contains .name with .family with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-prefix' with .valueString with a value and .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value
